details: Designed and trained convolutional neural networks for image classification tasks
Built end-to-end data pipelines using Apache Kafka and Spark for real-time data processing
Optimized model inference on edge devices, reducing latency by 40%
Collaborated with product teams to integrate AI features into mobile applications
Authored technical documentation and led knowledge-transfer workshops
Implemented unit and integration tests to ensure code reliability
Leading a team of data scientists to develop NLP solutions for automated report generation
Architected scalable ETL frameworks in AWS using Lambda and Glue services
Conducting A/B experiments and statistical analyses to measure model impact
Deployed RESTful API endpoints with Flask and Docker containers
Mentoring junior staff and conducting monthly AI knowledge-sharing sessions
